== Main Inclusion Report for zope-cmfplone ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** The package is available in Debian experimental.
 0. ''Rationale:''  
** "<nowiki>[[http://plone.org|Plone]]</nowiki>" is the state of the art Content Management System, based on Zope and CMF. It is a must for a server-oriented distribution.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** No CVEs or other security issues.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** No significant bugs in "<nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/zope-cmfplone|Debbugs]]</nowiki>"
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard debhelper packaging
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** zope2.8, zope-common
** python2.3-imaging binary missing
** The following packages are required in order to run a Plone site:
